description:
Laundry Boss Simulator puts you in charge of a humble laundromat with big potential—and even bigger piles of dirty socks. Start with a single washer and a whole lot of ambition as you wash, dry, fold, and hustle your way to laundry greatness.

Upgrade your machines, hire a helpful crew, and design a space so fresh even your clothes will breathe a sigh of relief. Offer extra services, stock up on detergents, and keep your customers smiling (and stain-free). Feeling creative? Customize t-shirts and let your fashion sense spin alongside the dryers.

From lost socks to loyal customers, you’ll find that the road to becoming a laundry tycoon is sudsy, satisfying, and full of surprises. After all, success smells a lot like fabric softener and victory.
